sources.title: GXO to cease operations at Georgia facility - Supply Chain Dive
sources.snippet: GXO Logistics Supply Chain is permanently ceasing operations at its Fairburn, Georgia facility, laying off all 69 employees, according to a Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification (WARN) Act letter dated Jan. 8..
